comment:
Increased Quality (and therefore rewards) for Onocoy (except Bynav)
Hardware reset receiver on new ELT0231 and ELT0731
Automatic restart of the main service when receiver data is lost (important for DIY setups)
Internet access via 4G/5G USB modems such as Huawei HiLink (for wired base stations)
Data transmission via radio modem (for wired base stations)
Wifi connection restored forever now
